Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: â€¢ It's bad news, city folk- power bills on the rise are pushing Victoria's household budgets to the limit, with 31% of people reporting their electricity supply cut off. On the other side of the coin, the value of the Australian dollar has been drooping due to mounting global financial concern. While the Reserve Bank's interest rate hikes remain in question, the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development has lowered its expectations for Australia's economic forecast over the next two years.
